experience.title: Data Analyst Summer Intern
info: Helped the firm make decisions on a project which demanded prediction on approval of loan applications of real life customers.
Gained extensive experience of dealing with real life data.

experience.title: Senior Associate Infrastructure L1
info: Successfully managed and executed production deployments for clients, ensuring a seamless transition and on-time go-live.
Led a team of DevOps & leveraged containerized deployments & orchestration along with pipeline automation through Azure DevOps and Azure Kubernetes Services to manage application workloads.
Collaborated with client to debottleneck their application gateways, resulting in a 50% reduction in manual intervention required for scaling
